gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Brussels weather data shows inconsistency. Meteoblue suggests lower temperatures (21.7°C vs 25°C peak) and is not stating rain probability. A classic spring day in Brussels, indeed, but remember, even a monkey would carry an umbrella when in doubt.
